##Synopsis

```{r "creatematrix", echo=TRUE}

##create data for analysis
set.seed(54321)
##makes sample sizes variable
rowsofsamples <- 1000
columnsofdistributions <- 40
##create data frame
rdata <- replicate(columnsofdistributions, rexp(rowsofsamples, .2)) 
##look at structure of data
str(rdata)

```


```{r "historgram_of_means"}

mean(rdata)

expmeans <- colMeans(rdata)

hist(expmeans, xlim=c(4.5,5.5), ylim=c(0,11))

meanofdistmeans<-mean(expmeans)
abline(v=meanofdistmeans, lwd=2, col="red")

abline(v=5, lwd=2, col="blue")
text(5,10.5, "Data Mean   ", col="red", adj=c(1,0))
text(5,10.5, "  Theoretical Mean", col="blue", adj=c(0,0))
```
